title: New: San Mei – Brighter
body: Australia’s **San Mei** first featured on [these pages](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/19301-introducing-san-mei/) at the start of the year, and predictably has now been picked up by a label (I jest…). Her debut single proper, _Brighter_, is released midway through next month, and showcases the dreamy, perfect pop that made her couple of debut tracks so enticing. Check out _Brighter_ below.
